header.title: OFFICIAL ELECTRONIC INFORMATION PAGE OF AGENCY FOR ENTERPRISE DEVELOPMENT, MINISTRY OF PLANNING AND INVESTMENT ON APPLICATION OF SUSTAINABLE BUSINESS

footer.address: No. 6B, Hoang Dieu, Ba Dinh, Hanoi

condition.introduction: To participate in the program, Vietnamese businesses need to meet the following criteria:
condition.condition_1: Is a Vietnamese economic organization/unit, including private enterprises, cooperatives, and business households, with no more than 500 full-time employees and no legal disputes.
condition.condition_2: Operating in priority areas of the USAID IPSC project such as agriculture-forestry-fishery, processing and manufacturing industry, information technology, logistics, tourism and support products.
condition.condition_3: Have an effective, profitable business model.
condition.condition_4: Have intention and commitment to action to implement ESG at the enterprise, transform or expand the business model sustainable business.

organization_profile.company_name: Business name (according to Business Registration Certificate):

organization_profile.manager_count: Total number of management level staff (from department head/head of department and above):
organization_profile.manager_female: in which, the total number of management level officers is female:
organization_profile.minor_workers: Total number of minor workers (if any):
organization_profile.minor_workers_tooltip: Minor workers are workers from 15 years old to under 18 years old
organization_profile.b6: Is the business a woman-owned business?
organization_profile.b6_tooltip: A woman-owned enterprise is an enterprise whose total charter capital is owned by women(s) accounting for 51% or more and in which there is at least one person at the management level running the enterprise
organization_profile.b7: Is the business run by women?
organization_profile.b7_tooltip: A business run by women is where a woman holds the highest executive position on the Board of Directors, possibly the position of General Director/CEO
organization_profile.business_model: The main production and business field of the enterprise belongs to which of the following industry groups:
organization_profile.started_nec: The year the KTTH implementation started (if deployed)
organization_profile.started_esg: The year the business started applying ESG (if implemented):
